scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix ../typescript-sdk && npm install --prefix ./ui-app && npm install --prefix ./ui-docs && npm install --prefix ./ui-editors
scripts.clean: rimraf dist && npm run clean-sdk && npm run clean-app && npm run clean-docs && npm run clean-editors
scripts.lint: npm run lint-sdk && npm run lint-app && npm run lint-docs && npm run lint-editors
scripts.build-sdk: npm run generate-sources --prefix ../typescript-sdk && npm run build --prefix ../typescript-sdk
scripts.build: npm run build-sdk && npm run build-app && npm run build-docs && npm run build-editors && node .scripts/generate-version.cjs
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix ./ui-app" "npm run dev --prefix ./ui-docs" "npm run dev --prefix ./ui-editors"
